item.title: 特朗普指示安全小组审查美国钢铁贸易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令对美国钢铁公司可能出售给新日本钢铁公司的交易进行审查，为修改其前任乔-拜登阻止该交易的决定打开了大门。【原文：President Donald Trump ordered a review of the potential sale of United States Steel Corp. to Nippon Steel Corp., opening the door to amend a decision by his predecessor, Joe Biden, to block the transaction.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发全球贸易震荡，欧盟贸易首脑们意见趋同
item.description: 针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的全面关税措施，欧盟各国贸易部长团结一致，表示准备采取全方位的反制措施，包括可能对数字公司征税。【原文：European Union trade ministers closed ranks and signaled readiness to deploy a full spectrum of countermeasures including potential taxes on digital companies in response to US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，英国对汽车制造商说 "我们支持你们
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）向英国汽车制造商表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上周征收关税使英国汽车业陷入混乱之后，政府将为他们提供支持。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves told UK automakers that the government will support them after US President Donald Trump’s tariffs last week sent the industry into turmoil.】

item.title: VIX 指数再次飙升，合约预示波动率将居高不下
item.description: Cboe 波动率指数在隔夜飙升至 60 以上后走高，期货曲线显示波动率可能在数月内保持高位。【原文：The Cboe Volatility Index is higher following an overnight spike above 60, and the futures curve is signaling that volatility may remain elevated for months.】

item.title: 银行推迟出售 HIG 美加 IT 合并贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以蒙特利尔银行为首的一批银行已经推迟了一项11亿美元的贷款出售计划，该计划将为HIG Capital LLC收购加拿大公司Converge Technology Solutions Corp.提供资金。【原文：A group of banks led by Bank of Montreal have postponed a $1.1 billion loan sale that was to help finance HIG Capital LLC’s planned purchase of Canadian firm Converge Technology Solutions Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华沙交易所因波动和高交易量暂停交易
item.description: 华沙证券交易所周一以 "安全原因 "为由，在波动性和交易量激增的情况下，暂停其所有市场的交易一个多小时。【原文：The Warsaw Stock Exchange is suspending trade on all its markets for more than an hour on Monday, citing “safety reasons” amid a spike in volatility and volumes.】

item.title: 欧盟将监控与关税有关的进口转移迹象
item.description: 在努力与特朗普政府进行谈判的同时，欧盟将成立一个进口监督工作组，以监控美国关税可能导致的商品转移。【原文：The European Union will set up an import surveillance task force to monitor potential diversion of goods as a result of US tariffs as it tries to pursue negotiations with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 英国统计机构应对数据危机的速度太慢，审查发现
item.description: 英国统计机构被指责在解决经济数据问题上行动过于迟缓，在一项官方审查中落后于国际同行，该审查警告称 "迫切需要 "对其进行现代化改造。【原文：The UK statistics agency was accused of being too slow to address its economic data problems and falling behind international peers in an official review that warned of an “urgent need” to modernize.】

item.title: 铜价跌破 8,500 美元，中国买家抢购一空
item.description: 交易商们表示，中国铜买家利用周一铜价跌破每吨8,500美元的机会大幅增加了采购量，即使在全球其他市场溃败进一步加深的情况下，也帮助引发了铜价的大幅反弹。【原文：Chinese copper buyers used Monday’s collapse in prices below $8,500 a ton to significantly increase purchases, traders said, helping to trigger a dramatic rebound even as a rout in other global markets deepened further.】

item.title: 关税冲击一切，S&P 500 指数将步入熊市
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战使美国股市有望进入自科维德大流行以来的首个熊市。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war has US stocks on track to enter their first bear market since the Covid pandemic.】

item.title: 俄罗斯拥抱黄金，缓解因战争而冻结的储备损失
item.description: 俄罗斯正在从战前的黄金购买狂潮中获益，这有助于抵消其雨天基金中大约三分之一的冻结资产。【原文：Russia is reaping the benefit of a pre-war gold-buying spree that’s helped offset roughly a third of the frozen assets in its rainy-day fund.】

item.title: 东欧女首富寻求布拉格顶级酒店的主要份额
item.description: Renata Kellnerova 是东欧最富有的女性，她在布拉格购买了第二家酒店，从而扩大了自己在房地产领域的版图，走上了控制豪华酒店领域最大份额的道路。【原文：Renata Kellnerova, the richest woman in eastern Europe, is boosting her footprint in real estate by buying a second hotel in Prague, setting herself on a path to control the biggest chunk of the luxury hospitality segment.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所在大跌中撤销 EFG 和 Swissquote 的违规交易
item.description: 随着周一全球市场的进一步下挫，瑞士的一些股票，如 EFG International AG 和 Swissquote Group Holding AG，也出现了下跌。【原文：As global markets sank further on Monday, some Swiss stocks — like EFG International AG and Swissquote Group Holding AG — appeared to crater.】

item.title: 以色列连续第 10 次维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列央行连续第 10 次会议维持利率不变，等待市场稳定和通胀减速后再开始降息。【原文：Israel’s central bank held interest rates for a 10th straight meeting, waiting for markets to stabilize and inflation to decelerate before starting cuts.】

item.title: 瑞银认为企业债券利差将达到 2020 年以来最阔水平
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的策略师预计，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税影响将把公司债券利差推高至大流行病初期的水平。【原文：UBS Group AG strategists expect the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs to push corporate-bond spreads to levels last seen during the early part of the pandemic.】

item.title: 埃尔多安对手被捕引发创纪录的土耳其债券退出潮
item.description: 3 月最后一周，外国投资者以创纪录的速度抛售土耳其政府债券，加深了伊斯坦布尔市长兼反对党头号人物埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁被捕引发的当地市场抛售。【原文：Foreign investors offloaded Turkish government bonds at a record pace in the final week of March, deepening the selloff in local markets triggered by the arrest of Istanbul’s mayor and top opposition figure, Ekrem Imamoglu.】

item.title: 面对特朗普关税，习近平誓言 "充分释放 "消费潜力
item.description: 在与美国的关税战中，中国国家主席习近平呼吁加强努力，"充分释放 "中国的消费潜力，以刺激经济增长。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping has called for strengthened efforts to “fully unleash” the country’s consumption potential to spur growth amid a tariff war with the US.】

item.title: 赛勒战略在会计变更后亏损 59 亿美元
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略 "公司（Strategy）表示，在采用要求按市场价格对数字资产进行估值的会计变更后，该公司第一季度将出现 59 亿美元的未实现亏损。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy said it will register an unrealized $5.9 billion loss in the first quarter after adopting an accounting change that requires valuing the digital asset at market prices.】

item.title: 沮丧的世界领导人怀疑特朗普是否想要达成协议
item.description: 随着恐慌情绪在全球市场蔓延，世界各国领导人在周末竞相向美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出全面降低关税的建议。【原文：With panic spreading in markets across the globe, world leaders raced over the weekend to make offers to US President Donald Trump to lower tariffs across the board.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易协定看似不可能达成，习近平转入战斗模式
item.description: 习近平主席决定迅速报复唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税，向全世界发出了一个明确的信息：如果美国想打贸易战，中国已经做好了战斗准备。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s decision to quickly retaliate against Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs sent the world a clear message: If the US wants a trade war, China is ready to fight.】

item.title: Match 任命董事，对抗安森基金的积极推动
item.description: Match Group Inc. 表示计划任命电子商务高管达雷尔-卡文斯（Darrell Cavens）进入董事会，并建议股东不要投票支持激进投资者 Anson Funds Management LP 上周晚些时候提出的三名候选人。【原文：Match Group Inc. said it plans to appoint e-commerce executive Darrell Cavens to its board and advised shareholders not to vote for the three candidates put forward late last week by activist investor Anson Funds Management LP.】

item.title: 对冲基金在市场疲软中录得历史性单日股票大跌
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds recorded their largest-ever one-day net sales of global equities on the first day of trading after President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs announcement, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage desk.】

item.title: 英国为苹果加密战保密的努力在法庭上受阻
item.description: 一家法院阻止了英国政府对其要求获取苹果公司用户数据的法律案件保密的企图，这是隐私权倡导者的一次胜利。【原文：A court has blocked a British government attempt to keep secret a legal case over its demand to access Apple Inc. user data in a victory for privacy advocates.】

item.title: 诺和诺德银行称正继续为可能的首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 由 Lone Star 持有多数股权的葡萄牙贷款公司 Novo Banco SA 表示，该公司正在继续为可能的首次公开募股做准备，但尚未确定出售的确切时间。【原文：Novo Banco SA, a Portuguese lender that’s majority-owned by Lone Star, said it’s continuing to prepare for a possible initial public offering, with no exact timing set yet for a sale.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯全球销量下滑，中国订单减少 10
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）在其最大的市场中国正进一步落后，激烈的竞争和持续的价格战正在挤压欧洲汽车制造商。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG is falling further behind in China, its largest market, where fierce competition and an ongoing price war are squeezing European carmakers.】

item.title: 泰国官员称不会急于降低美国进口税
item.description: 一位政府顾问表示，泰国为尽量减少美国关税带来的冲击而采取的策略将包括承诺进口更多商品和增加美国投资，而不是直接提出削减进口税。【原文：Thailand’s strategy to minimize the hit from US tariffs will include pledges to import more goods and ramping up of US investments, and not any outright offer to cut import taxes, according to a government adviser.】

item.title: 特朗普关税冲击市场，亚洲首富损失 460 亿美元
item.description: 受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布加征关税的影响，周一亚洲市场继续下跌，亚洲首富的财富也随之暴跌。【原文：The fortunes of Asia’s richest plunged on Monday as markets across the region continued to fall in the wake of President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements.】

item.title: 关税增加政治和财政风险，罗马尼亚维持利率不变
item.description: 全球贸易紧张局势升级加剧了国内政治和预算风险，在总统选举重选前一个月，罗马尼亚央行第五次会议维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a fifth meeting as escalating global trade tensions compounded domestic political and budget risks one month before a presidential election re-run.】

item.title: 在市场疲软之际，香港暂无 "严厉措施 "计划
item.description: 在香港股市遭遇近三十年来最严重的下跌之后，香港政府并不打算推出任何 "严厉措施 "来阻止关税战带来的混乱。【原文：The Hong Kong government doesn’t plan to roll out any “drastic measures” to stem the mayhem brought about by the tariff war after the city’s stock market suffered its worst dip in almost three decades.】

item.title: 德国哈贝克称，马斯克正表现出虚弱和恐惧的迹象
item.description: 即将卸任的德国副总理罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）说，埃隆-马斯克支持跨大西洋零关税贸易体系的言论表明了这位亿万富翁的软弱和恐惧。【原文：Elon Musk’s comments in support of a zero-tariff transatlantic trade system are a sign of the billionaire’s weakness and fear, Germany’s outgoing Vice Chancellor Robert Habeck said.】
